exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : Rbar Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Rbar_opp ?M2365) P -> filtermap (fun y : R => - ?M2363 y) (Rbar_locally' ?M2364) P" with "Lim (fun y : R => - f y) x = Rbar_opp (Lim f x)".

In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> is_lim (fun y : R => - f y) x (Rbar_opp l) f : R -> R x : Rbar Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Lim ?M2545 ?M2546) P -> filtermap ?M2545 (Rbar_locally' ?M2546) P" with "Lim (fun y : R => - f y) x = Rbar_opp (Lim f x)".
